Text:
Did his parents know 
 That Sapan would eponymously 
 Dream a cure 
 For children with no phones?

Village houses made of clay 
 With roadside walls 
 Painted midnight black 
 For children whose heritage is wall-painting.

Classes for 290 of them 
 From the Upgraded Middle School 
 Dumarthar Village, Jarmundi block 
 Right outside their homes.

Classes for 290 of them 
 From the Upgraded Middle School 
 Dumarthar Village, Jarmundi block 
 Right outside their homes.

Sapan - a dream!  
 A wonderful solution 
 Before it rains  
 And phones haunt childrenâ€™s dreams.
THINK: Who can use the Internet to magnify a good deed?
